Plot: Eight Mexican directors unite to bring tales of the most brutally terrifying Mexican traditions and legends to vividly shocking life.
Title: Barbarous Mexico
Writer: Isaac Ezban, Laurette Flores Bornn, Jorge Michel Grau, Alfredo Mendoza, Edgar Nito, Lex Ortega (created by), Lex Ortega, Paulo Riqué, Gigi Saul Guerrero, Aaron Soto
Director: Isaac Ezban, Laurette Flores Bornn, Jorge Michel Grau, Ulises Guzman, Edgar Nito, Lex Ortega, Gigi Saul Guerrero, Aaron Soto
Actors: Adrián Aguirre, Dulce Alexa, Leslie Arce, Leif Bridgman
